name: Plot Point
description:
IMPORTANT: MAKE THE GAME FULL SCREEN FOR FULL ENGAGEMENT

Choose from a variety of graphs and work out the equation from only a few points on the line.

Initially simple, with 20 points plotted, progress to increasingly more challenging graphs where only 5 points are given, enhancing your mathematical abilities.

Explore the graphical, trigonometric and polynomial mind of yours!

Graphs include:
◘ Linear
◘ Quadratic
◘ Cubic
◘ Sine Function
◘ Cosine Function
◘ Tangent Function
◘ Random Mode (could be any of them and you need to work out which it is!)
◘ More to come (hopefully)


Difficulty settings include:
◘ Easy
◘ Normal
◘ Hard
◘ More to come (hopefully)

PlotPoint is very useful for mathematics examinations including:
◘ GCSE Mathematics (Edexcel, AQA, OCR)
◘ A-Level Mathematics (Edexcel, AQA, OCR)
◘ Edexcel Level 3 Algebra Award
◘ FSMQ - Free Standing Maths Qualification (Edexcel, OCR)
◘ SATs
◘ and many more...
